20101224010929.000|20101224010931.000|TR0|SPITZER:  With this year almost over, we 
20101224010931.000|20101224010933.000|TR0|look back at some of the most important

20101224012852.000|20101224012854.000|TR0|CLAY SHIRKY, SOCIAL NETWORKING EXPERT:  On 
20101224012854.000|20101224012856.000|TR0|the contrary, I said I'm not for total 
20101224012856.000|20101224012859.000|TR0|transparency.  If, for example, there was

20101224013844.000|20101224013846.000|TR0|have done is changed his selectivity bias.

20101224013849.000|20101224013851.000|TR0|what he said now was when I did document
